name: forliquid_server
description: Test app about liquids for "Team Liquid" :)

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run client:install && npm run client:build
